DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether transcutaneous application unmodulated 30 Kilohertz ( KHz ) alternate current could produce quickly conduction block pain whiplash patient decrease .
DOC.detailed_description: In last year several animal experimental study evidence high frequency unmodulated current 5 KHz cause peripheral nerve block . However electric current high frequency usually use treatment pain human interrupt modulate ( i.e . interferential current ) . It show diameter nerve relate frequency produce conduction block . For reason decide applied 30KHz observe effect pain patient whiplash compare versus sham stimulation . Only one study apply 5KHz experimental pain demonstrate change somatosensory threshold .
